instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2530 TS0P unable read error
threads.message:
Hello everybody;

I m working on A1278 2009 year. Fan noise and CPU usage %100 . When do ASD it shows TS0P unable read error.

Tried;

replaced track pad and cable
replaced bluetooth and wifi cable with know good cable
replaced SMC

same status

where can i check next step?

thanks

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2530 TS0P unable read error
threads.message:
Unplug airport cable. There is nothing else on this bus besides trackpad/ALS. 
If it still not working measure both data lines on diode mode.

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2530 TS0P unable read error
threads.message: Thank you Duke I2C_ALS_SDA line is shorted ground in J3401 replaced connector and solved problem.
